english.segment1: I live with the old swing and trumpets. And fly through my country and play it. And those who have calling, they have it
english.segment2: And everyone needs a light. A place in the sun. I like your photographs. I need one
english.segment3: You act like a stranger and I'll bet. You gave them my number and the rest. To those who keep calling and run it
english.segment4: And everyone needs a light. A place in the sun. I like your photographs. I need one
